content:
Hi All -- I am proposing a block vote on Oct. 25 on 16 FHIR Shorthand issues. As usual, please let me know if there are any requests for separate discussion on any issue.
FSH-Block-Vote-2.xlsx
The query is: project="FHIR" AND Specification = "Shorthand (FHIR) [FHIR-shorthand]" and createdDate >= '2021-08-01' and createdDate < '2021-09-20' and grouping = Block-Vote-2
